coreAttributes.name: men's shoe
coreAttributes.description: A pair of smart men's shoes, suitable for all formal occasions.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] [npc.her] [npc.feet] into the shoes and [npc.verb(tie)] up the laces.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet] into the shoes and [npc.verb(tie)] up the laces.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(push)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet] into the shoes and [npc.verb(tie)] up the laces.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the laces of [npc.her] shoes, before slipping them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the laces of [npc2.namePos] shoes, before slipping them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(untie)] the laces of [npc2.namePos] shoes, before tugging them off.
